patthana16.8:4.1: Abyākato sanidassano dhammo naabyākatassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.8:4.2: Abyākato sanidassano dhammo nakusalassa nasanidassanassa … pe ….
patthana16.8:4.5: Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte cha, atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana16.8:5.1: Kusalaṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.8:5.4: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
